original_title: Hey, You're as Funny as Fozzie Bear
overview: Fozzie Bear teaches the viewers -- as well as his young friends P.J. and Kai-Lee -- to tell funny jokes and perform impressions and magic tricks. At the end of the video, Fozzie encourages the viewers to bring their parents and friends into the room, to see their Big-Time Comedy Show.
title: Hey, You're as Funny as Fozzie Bear
